amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 5 entitled "Customer-Suit Exemption" which inserts a new provision into the patent code requiring a court to grant a motion to stay a pattern infringement suit against certain "covered customers".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 113-283 to strike section 5, the "Customer-suit exception" provision.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 296 (Roll no. 625).
